A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Why I liked it:
1-Visually this movie is absolutely stunning. A well-balanced use of  CG and animatronics.
2-It has some resemblance with "Empire Strikes Back" but still manages to tell an original story.
3-The movie was not too serious or too light hearted. I think the hit the right spot in terms of the tone of the movie. 
4-They didn't shy away to kill off some important character. (which is also a problem with this movie.) 

Why I did not :
1-It contained three movies within it.
2-First I thought these three different plots will lead to a point where all them will serve a purpose to help each other. But instead\, it was just three different characters personal journey which leads to nowhere.
4-Few characters were wasted and few characters were given just too much importance.
